title: DDoS Attack Mitigation
description: An analyst must mitigate a Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attack that is overwhelming a public-facing military website.

tasks.description: Acknowledge alerts of high traffic and server unavailability for the website.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst confirms the symptoms of a DDoS attack.

tasks.description: Analyze incoming traffic to identify the characteristics of the attack (e.g., source countries, traffic type).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies the nature of the malicious traffic.

tasks.description: Engage a cloud-based DDoS mitigation service to scrub the malicious traffic before it reaches the website.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully reroutes traffic through the scrubbing service, restoring website availability.
